itemText: I believe the aid is a competent performer
I have confidence in the advice given by the aid
I can depend on the aid
I can rely on the aid to behave in consistent ways
I can rely on the aid to do its best every time I take its advice
On trials you completed with assistance from the aid, how frequently did you think the aid was correct?
On trials you completed without the aid, how frequently did you think you were correct?
